title: Penguin Restaurant Mge
description: Penguin Restaurant is a charming management game where a group of penguin friends set out to run a successful eatery in Antarctica. Serve customers, expand the restaurant, and attract more visitors as business grows. Earn profits to open new locations and build a thriving franchise. Can you turn this cozy restaurant into a global success?

title: Knock And Run
description: Knock and Run: 100 Doors Escape is a fast-paced arcade game where you race through hotel corridors, ringing doorbells and pulling off hilarious pranks. But be careful—residents react unpredictably, and trouble is always around the corner. Outsmart everyone, stay on the move, and see if you can become the ultimate trickster without getting caught!

title: Mirrorland
description: Mirrorland is a turn-based strategy set in a fantastical realm teeming with heroes and monsters. Embark on an epic journey through this magical world, brimming with perilous encounters and thrilling adventures at every turn. Traverse through the looking glass into a realm of enigmatic puzzles and terrifying foes. Unravel the mysteries, aid mythical beings, vanquish villains, and safeguard the universe of Mirrorland. With stunning visuals, an immersive storyline, diverse hero selection, and engaging multiplayer features, prepare for an unforgettable quest where bravery and cunning are your greatest weapons.

title: Girls Nail Salon   Nail Games
description: Nail Salon is a creative and fun nail art experience where you transform clients’ nails into dazzling works of beauty. Step into a vibrant salon, welcome your customers, and unleash your artistic skills to create stunning makeovers. Express your creativity with endless designs and colors, making each client’s nails truly shine. 💅✨

title: Crusher Block Jwd
description: Crusher Block is an idle game where you smash blocks, earn money, and upgrade your tools to create the most powerful crushing machine! Can you build the ultimate resource-crushing machine?

title: Traffic Rider Vvq
description: Traffic Rider is a first-person endless racing game that puts you on a motorbike for an exhilarating ride. With a full career mode, lifelike bike sounds, and detailed graphics, it redefines arcade racing. Speed through highways, overtake traffic, and upgrade your rides to conquer challenging missions. Embrace the thrill and master the art of smooth racing.

title: Fashion Week 2025
description: Fashion Week 2025 is a fashion game where you take on the role of a top stylist, preparing for the most glamorous event of the year. Style five stunning models in high-fashion looks, creating jaw-dropping outfits across five unique themes. From Chanel-inspired elegance to punk rock rebellion, mix-and-match couture dresses, bold accessories, and trendy hairstyles make every model shine. Unleash your creativity, perfect your styling skills, and take over the fashion world. Are you ready to rule the runway? Play now and slay the competition!

title: Rpg Idle Clicker Uzz
description: RPG Idle Clicker is an incremental game where you embark on an adventure to slay monsters. Click to deal damage, earn gold, and unlock powerful swords to enhance your attacks. Upgrade your blades and recruit auto-attacking heroes who battle monsters every second, even while you are offline. With stunning WebGL visuals, face tougher enemies and epic bosses in this browser-based game. Whether you prefer active gameplay or idle progression, RPG Idle Clicker offers endless growth. Get ready and become the ultimate monster hunter!

title: Pirates Of The Caribbean Tow
description: Pirates of the Caribbean: Tides of War is a strategic adventure set in the legendary world of pirates. Join Jack Sparrow, Will Turner, and Captain Barbossa on a high-stakes quest for treasure. Command your fleet, engage in fierce battles, and navigate the treacherous seas. Do you have what it takes to become a true pirate legend?

title: Ink Shop Dress Tattoo Games
description: The Ink Studio is a creative and relaxing simulation that transforms you into a master tattoo artist. Each session challenges you to bring your customers' unique stories and designs to life with precision and care. Dive into the intricate world of tattooing, where your artistic skills and attention to detail truly shine.

title: Knight Clicker
description: Knight Clicker is a medieval-themed clicking adventure where every tap brings you closer to victory. Unlock powerful upgrades, boost your progress with massive multipliers, and challenge yourself to set the fastest time. Conquer new lands, strengthen your knight, and see how quickly you can rise to greatness in this fast-paced journey of strategy and progression!

title: Find The Vampire
description: Find the Vampire is a fun casual game where you act as a hunter to stop a vampire uprising. Your mission is to identify bloodsuckers hiding among ordinary people, animals, and even objects, then eliminate them to free the city from danger. Use special exterminator kits and detectors to expose hidden vampires. Unlock new locations, complete challenging levels, and defeat the Vampire Lord to save the citizens.

title: Letterclash
description: LetterClash is a strategic word battle game where every move matters. Compete against opponents by forming words, capturing territory, and using powerful bonuses to control the board. Outsmart your rival and be the first to conquer the top row, or risk losing your ground.

title: Block Legends
description: Block Legends is a puzzle game where you drag and match blocks. In this casual puzzle game, you drag and arrange blocks on a board. Form a horizontal or vertical line to clear it and discover diamonds, bombs, and score multipliers along the way. Complete missions to earn rewards, with new challenges resetting every few minutes to keep the action going. Collect enough diamonds to buy powerful items like bombs and nukes, helping you clear levels with ease.

title: Space Waves
description: Space Waves is an arcade game where you need to control an arrow to avoid obstacles until you get to the end. There are 33 levels to the game, and you can choose any level you want to play at any time. All levels vary in difficulty and are labeled accordingly with faces; this way you get to decide how courageous you want to be.

title: Sky Riders Buk
description: Sky Riders is a high-speed casual vehicle driving game. Put your driving skills to the test as you complete several challenging tracks. Stay focused and avoid falling off! Whether you're behind the wheel of a car or riding a motorcycle, prepare for an adrenaline-fueled adventure and unforgettable racing moments. Get ready to conquer difficult tests and feel the excitement of Sky Riders!

title: Cubes 2048 Io
description: Cubes 2048.io is an addictive online game that fuses Snake and 2048. Get a bigger number by collecting free cubes and eating other players with a smaller number than you. Your cubes with the same value that bump into one another will merge.

title: Escape From Prison Multiplayer
description: Escape From Prison Multiplayer is a thrilling multiplayer platformer game where your mission is to make a daring escape from prison! Customize your brave little mouse and race against time to break out. Each room you conquer brings you closer to freedom, but watch out for the dangerous traps and obstacles in your way! Can you outsmart the prison's challenges and make a successful escape? Test your skills and find out if you have what it takes to flee from prison!

title: Holey Io Battle Royale
description: Holey.io is a battle royale game where you consume various items and opponents with smaller holes. You will grow bigger as you swallow! The map will continuously shrink, forcing players into a narrower environment until there is only one person left standing. Consume, grow, and become the last hole standing in the arena!

title: Evowarsio
description: EvoWars.io is an IO battle game set in a top-down online battle arena. Collect orbs and battle other players to evolve your warrior. Each evolution improves your weapon range but slows your movement. How many will you slay before you fall?

title: Race Clicker Tap Tap Game
description: Race Clicker: Tap Tap Game is a clicker game with a thrilling racing experience that challenges your speed, agility, and strategy. Control your runner with a single tap through intricate tracks and obstacles. Train your character to enhance muscle, speed, and endurance, unlocking new skills and items. Master quick reactions and strategic speed usage to outpace opponents and claim victory. With stunning scenery and varied terrain, find the balance between speed and endurance to become the ultimate race champion.

title: Gridpunk   3V3 Battle Royale
description: Gridpunk - Battle Royale 3v3 PvP is an IO battle game where lightning-fast reflexes and precision will determine how far you make it through to the end of this real-time shooter action. This high-intensity game requires you to stay sharp, aim true, and master the art of drone attacks to outwit and overpower your opponents. Each 3v3 PvP match puts you against players in real-time in multiplayer battles. There’s no room for luck—it's all about skill, strategy, and timing.

title: Jump Guys
description: Jump Guys is a casual 3D multiplayer platformer where you navigate vibrant obstacle courses filled with traps, power-ups, and collectibles. Jump, climb, and race to the finish while dodging hazards. Activate power-ups for temporary boosts and collect coins to customize your character. Conquer increasingly difficult worlds with thrilling physics-defying stunts. Only one way forward: only up!

title: Mini Golf Club
description: Mini Golf Club is a realistic 3D mini golf simulator with fun gameplay and hundreds of challenging levels.

title: Shellshockersio
description: Shell Shockers (Shellshock.io) is a multiplayer .io FPS game featuring eggs armed with guns. You control one of these weapon-wielding eggs in one of four online game modes where the aim is to shatter your opponents with bullets and bombs. It's the ultimate online egg shooting game!

title: Agario
description: Agar.io is the original .io grow game. Play as a simple agar cell fighting to become the largest cell in a multiplayer game arena. Avoid the bigger cells and consume the smaller ones to grow larger.

title: Uno Online
description: Four Colors lets you play the popular card game for free in your web browser. The aim of the game is to be the first player with no cards, similar to other Crazy Eights style card games. Play a game like UNO in multiplayer with 2, 3, or 4 players.

title: Geometry Dash Online
description: Geometry Dash Online is a free side-scrolling platformer played in sync with musical rhythms. Groove your way over and under obstacles to keep the musical momentum alive. If you slip up, it’s back to the beginning!

title: Moto X3M
description: Moto X3M is a driving bike game that takes dirt bike racing to the next level. It combines high-speed thrills with a test of precision and timing across 22 adrenaline-filled levels. Each course introduces fresh, intense obstacles—from gravity-defying loops to dangerous ramps and explosive traps—keeping you on the edge of your seat. Gear up, strap on your helmet, and prepare to perform stunts of a lifetime as you race against the clock.

title: Smash Karts
description: Smash Karts is a 3D multiplayer IO kart battle game. Drive your go-kart, pick up weapons, and blow up other karts to win! Keep playing to level up and unlock new characters and prizes.

title: Worldguessr
description: Worldguessr is a casual quiz game, a free alternative to Geoguessr, perfect for testing and expanding your geography skills through immersive Street View exploration. Each round, you will find yourself dropped into random locations around the globe, with only environmental clues to guide you in pinpointing your exact whereabouts. From cityscapes to rural roads, your surroundings become the puzzle pieces you need to analyze, turning each game into a thrilling geographical investigation.

title: Drift Boss
description: Drift Boss is a casual one-click driving game where you drive your car around very tricky corners and over bumps, aiming to reach what seems like an infinite end! The race track has no guardrails, so you will fall off the platform and into an abyss if you make one false move. Keep playing to earn rewards and unlock better cars!

title: Bubble Shooter Classic
description: Bubble Shooter is a free casual puzzle game inspired by Puzzle Bobble. Match 3 of the same colored bubble to pop the group!

title: Slice Master
description: Slice Master is a casual one-person game whose goal is to slice everything in sight, well, almost everything. This one-button game is driven by precision, timing, and discernment to rack up a high score. Flying knives are generally a no-no, but in this game, they are the only way to progress to new blades and skins.

title: Eggy Car
description: Eggy Car is a casual game where you drive a car containing a loose egg over hilly roads. When the egg falls out of your vehicle, it breaks and the game ends. RIP! Collect power-ups to help you get further. Good luck and godspeed egg soldier.

title: Tiny Fishing
description: Tiny Fishing is a fun fishing game where you draw your line and hook as many fish as possible. Each fish you catch on your line earns you money. Keep fishing to earn more coins and unlock upgrades!

title: Tile Guru
description: Tile Guru is a casual puzzle tile-matching game that combines mental sharpness with relaxation. Spend just 10 minutes a day matching vibrant 3D tiles and finding new fruit designs while mastering strategic match flips. With its unique puzzlescapes, escalating challenges, and a serene zen-inspired color palette, this game offers a perfect blend of brain training and tranquility, making it your ideal daily escape.

title: Piles Of Mahjong Jhb
description: Piles of Mahjong is an engaging and relaxing puzzle game that combines the classic elements of Mahjong with a match-three twist. As you progress through the levels, you’ll need to clear stacks of tiles by matching three identical ones, but be careful—strategic thinking is essential to avoid getting stuck!

title: Little Alchemy
description: Little Alchemy is a creative and educational crafting game where players combine different elements to create new items. Starting with basic elements like air, earth, fire, and water, players mix these to produce more complex items.

title: Little Alchemy 2
description: Little Alchemy 2 is an intuitive online crafting game developed by Recloak. The aim is to combine elements to create new ones. Start by mixing Earth, air, fire, and water to produce new elements. Discover over 700 items and unlock the recipes to time, matter, and the Universe!

title: Designville Merge Design
description: Designville: Merge & Design is a casual game that takes you on a creative adventure to renovate and decorate various spaces. Tackle unique design challenges, craft stunning interiors, and turn your studio into the best in town. Unleash your creativity to bring your dream designs to life and grow your decorating empire!

title: Happy Wheels
description: Happy Wheels is a side-scrolling ragdoll physics game. Navigate through the levels using one of several unique characters without being torn limb from limb. Sound easy? Think again. Happy Wheels was one of the earliest browser games to utilize wacky ragdoll physics as a key element of the game.

title: Bloons Tower Defense
description: Bloons Tower Defense is a casual game where your mission is to build and fortify your defenses to stop an ever-growing wave of colorful balloons from reaching the end of the track. This classic game started the legendary Bloons TD series and continues some of the gameplay. You must strategically place a wide variety of units, from dart-throwing monkeys to powerful turrets, and enhance them with upgrades to maximize your popping power. As the levels progress, so do the challenges.

title: Super Auto Pets
description: Super Auto Pets is a multiplayer battle game featuring cute pets with unique abilities. Set your strategy and take the fight to other online players. Play at your own pace in this laid-back auto-battle adventure.

title: Papas Pizzeria
description: Papa's Pizzeria is back! Thanks to Ruffle you can now play Papa's Pizzeria for free in your web browser once again. Papa has spontaneously left town, leaving you in charge of the pizzeria. It's on you to take orders, add pizza toppings, put them in the oven, and cut the pizzas! Work fast and make Papa Louie proud.

title: Friday Night Funkin
description: Friday Night Funkin’ is a musical rhythm game where you compete in freestyle music battles. Press the arrow keys in time with the music to outdo your opponents and enjoy the cool beats!

title: Blob Opera
description: Blob Opera is an experimental music game developed by David Li in collaboration with Google Arts & Culture. The game uses a machine learning model trained on real voices to make it easy for anyone to create amazing operatic music!

title: Ragdoll Archers
description: Ragdoll Archers is an archery game featuring bow and arrow-equipped stickmen with ragdoll physics. Fire arrows at a range of opponents while earning points to upgrade your abilities and ammunition. Play two-player PvP against your friend or team up with them to defeat a range of foes!

title: Count Masters Stickman Games
description: Count Masters: Stickman Games is a fast-paced running game where you gather a growing army of stickmen to clash against rival crowds. Navigate through obstacles, choose the best paths to multiply your numbers, and lead your team to victory. Battle fierce opponents, defeat the King-stickman, and claim the castle in an action-packed race filled with strategy and excitement!

title: Solar Smash
description: Planet Smash Destruction is a casual game in which you wield cosmic power to create and destroy planets. You can try out different weapons, design custom planetary systems, and release black holes. With easy-to-use controls, it suits both beginners and seasoned players. Unleash your creativity and discover the wonders of space in this captivating physics simulator.

title: Ragdoll Break
description: Playground Man! Ragdoll Show! is a casual 3D game with ragdoll physics where you enter a world of destruction. Get ready to tear apart a wooden stickman! Immerse yourself in a physics-based playground, smash obstacles, and relax while solving engaging puzzles.

title: Idle Saga
description: Idle Saga is a fantasy adventure where swords and magic shape your journey. Gather powerful equipment, harness divine and demonic transformations, and conquer every realm in your path. Team up with mystical elves and mighty mercenaries to take on fearsome bosses. Every battle brings new challenges, making each step toward domination more thrilling than the last!

title: Empire Clicker
description: Empire Clicker is a clicker game where you transform an empty plot of land into a thriving metropolis. Unleash your city-building skills as your settlement evolves into a bustling, dynamic cityscape.

title: Draw Climber
description: Draw Climber is a quirky racing game where you control your characters by sketching their legs. Create any shape to keep moving, and if you get stuck, simply redraw to overcome obstacles. Experiment with different designs to find the fastest way to the finish line. Can you outdraw and outrun the competition?

title: Cut In Half Please
description: Cut in Half, Please! is a precision-based puzzle game that tests your accuracy. Your goal is simple—slice various things exactly in half. Success depends on keeping the volume difference under 5%, so steady hands and sharp focus are key. Challenge yourself with each cut and see if you can master the perfect slice!

title: Apocalypse Reborn Qff
description: Apocalypse Reborn is a top-down survival game where you gather resources, build shelters, and fight off zombies. Explore new areas by collecting materials, crafting tools, and unlocking upgrades. Rescue survivors to expand your team and strengthen your defenses. Keep building, keep surviving, and construct a helicopter to make your ultimate escape from the apocalypse!

title: Supermarket Simulator Cashier Game
description: Supermarket Simulator: Store Manager is a dynamic retail experience where you juggle cashier duties and store management. Scan items, process payments, and keep customers happy while managing stock and organizing shelves. As challenges intensify, you’ll grow your store and meet rising demand. Can you handle the rush and build a thriving supermarket empire?

title: Guess Their Answer
description: Guess Their Answer is a casual quiz game where your goal is to outsmart opponents by predicting the most popular answers. Tackle three head-scratching questions per round across diverse topics, earn rewards, and unlock unique skins to personalize your experience. With daily quizzes and competitive matches, every game is a chance to prove you know your trivia.

title: Bridge Race
description: Bridge Race is a competitive casual collect building game where you gather blocks to construct your bridge while outsmarting rivals. Stay alert as other players may try to steal your progress, adding an exciting twist to the challenge. Strategize and race to complete your bridge first in this thrilling test of skill and speed!

title: Tile Jumper 3D
description: Tile Jumper 3D is a thrilling music game that tests your timing and reflexes. Leap across tiles in sync with the beat, aiming for precise jumps to keep the melody alive. Challenge yourself to reach higher scores while grooving to hit tracks. Compete on the leaderboard and show your rhythm skills—how far can you go?

title: Zoo   Happy Animals
description: Zoo – Happy Animals is a zoo simulator game where you need to complete a series of everyday zoo-related tasks to progress to the next level. Be careful, though, because if you're timing is off, you may find yourself in trouble.

title: Tile Journey
description: Tile Journey is a Match 3 puzzle game that tests your strategic skills. Take advantage of the seven empty slots to match three of the same tiles. But, be careful because failing to make a trio in all slots will end the game!

title: Bubble Tower 3D
description: Bubble Tower 3D is a bubble shooter arcade game where you must destroy colored balls on the cylinder-shaped area. This game comes with an amazing Aztec theme! Try to connect at least 3 bubbles of the same color to destroy the balls and reach the top of the tower. Not enough action happening? Try out the destructive fireball and watch him do his magic. Let's go and reach the high score.

title: Arkadium S Bubble Shooter
description: Arkadium's Bubble Shooter is an exciting casual bubble shooter game. Match three or more bubbles of the same color to clear them and increase your score. Let's get popping!

title: We Become What We Behold
description: We become what we behold as a casual 5-minute point-and-click game about news cycles, vicious cycles, and infinite cycles. Capture moments with your camera and see how the squares and circles react!

title: Gold Miner
description: Gold Miner is a classic casual mining game reminiscent of the early 2000s that has captivated players for years. In this timeless adventure, you'll seek to collect gold, stones, and minerals to reach your daily goal and amass wealth beyond your wildest dreams. With each successful mining expedition, you'll earn money that can be used to purchase valuable upgrades, including explosives that allow you to mine more efficiently than ever before. And now, thanks to its HTML5 port, you can enjoy the game on both your desktop and in your browser, anytime and anywhere you please!

title: Classic Backgammon
description: Backgammon Online is a casual game adapted from the original board game for online players. This is a game of logic that allows you to play the classic and ancient board game of backgammon against other players worldwide. This game has been around for years, almost 5000 to be exact, and this classic title has all of the standard gameplay and rules.

title: Backpack Battles
description: Backpack Battles is an engaging battle game where strategic packing is key to your success! Assemble your items in your backpack, carefully considering their placement for maximum effectiveness in combat. Choose wisely from various items with different attributes, prices, and rarities, combining them to create even more powerful equipment. Brew a powerful potion, craft a legendary weapon, or hatch a dragon friend! Engage in a battle against other players' builds and counter their strategies. Test your skills in Ranked mode, or have a relaxing time in Casual mode. Good luck!

title: Getting Over It
description: Getting Over It is a challenging casual arcade climbing game that puts your patience—and skill—to the ultimate test. Armed with only a hammer, you’ll tackle a steep, obstacle-laden mountain, relying on precise physics to swing, push, and propel yourself upward. Every inch you gain will make you sweat but will be well worth it, and one small mistake can send you tumbling back to the start.

title: Ovo
description: OvO is a fast-paced platformer where you use precise parkour and free running skills to complete each level. The levels feature increasingly tricky obstacles and you’ll need to do various jumps, slides, and dives to avoid them.

title: Pou
description: Pou is a digital pet game featuring various fun mini-games. Help this cute little alien grow by feeding, cleaning, and playing with them.

title: Dumb Ways To Die Original
description: Dumb Ways to Die is a casual game where the player’s goal is to protect an animated character, initially labeled as “dunce”, from a multitude of challenges. Originally a PSA campaign commissioned by Metro Trains in Melbourne, the safety first message soon became even more popularized via a video game.

title: Ice Fishing
description: Ice Fishing is a casual game for passionate anglers. Whether it's winter or summer, you'll find yourself on the snowy ice, surrounded by stunning winter landscapes with very real first-person graphics. Armed with an auger, fishing rod, bait, and a fish-filled lake, it's a dream come true for any fishing enthusiast. Test your skills, from catching big perch to reeling in massive pike. With various fish species and modes for all levels, you'll immerse yourself in the real world of ice fishing from the comfort of your home.

title: Frogger
description: Frogger is a classic arcade game. Control the frog over hazardous roads and rivers to reach the other side. Rinse and repeat. This newer version features updated graphics but remains largely the same as the original Frogger.

title: Good Doggo
description: Good Doggo is a fun game that is perfect for animal lovers and those who own a cute dog! Every dog deserves treats if they are well behaved and our cute doggo is no exception! You must help our dog balance treats on his nose – try to balance as many as possible in the given time-frame. Once you have balanced as many as possible, the dog will then throw the treats and attempt to catch them all in his mouth.

title: Pop It 3D
description: Pop It is a satisfying arcade game to pop all the bubbles in different character figures.
